description: Try our easy to follow Oysterpoboy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Oysterpoboy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 oysters in the half shell, removed from shells
0.5 cup parsley, dill & tarragon seafood sauce (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Pat dry oysters with paper towel. Dip in egg then roll in breadcrumbs, pressing gently to coat. Place on a plate. Fill buns with lettuce and avocado.

Heat the oil in a heavybased saucepan or frying pan over medium heat (to test when oil is ready, breadcrumbs should turn golden in 15 seconds). Using a slotted spoon, lower the oysters into the oil, in 4 batches, and cook for 1â€“2 minutes until golden. Transfer to paper towel to drain. Ensure oil has returned to correct temperature between batches.
Add 2 oysters to each roll. Season to taste. Serve with mayonnaise.
